EmailTemplate.description: Notification e-mail HTML sent when a case is logged online by an airline in Africa (English)
EmailTemplate.name: AFR_Case confirmation - online HTML - Airlines (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: Case {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Note that this is an auto-reply message. Please do not respond to this email.
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your enquiry. Case #{!Case.CaseNumber} has been created and one of our Customer Service Representatives will get back to you shortly. Please use the above Case Number if you need to contact us in regards to this case.
Best regards,
IATA Customer Service Africa
{!Case.Thread_Id}
